remarks: Any 1-dimensional subspace is a value of isomorphism H. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dih1dimat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dih1dimat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih1dimat.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih1dimat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dih1dimat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ P e. A ) -> P e. ran I ) $.
